title: Carlos Martínez (boxer)
text: Carlos Martínez (born 29 September 1978) is a Mexican <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201996%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1996%20Summer%20Olympics">1996 Summer Olympics</a>.
